channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump struck deals with 16 drug companies. But they're still raising prices this year
item.description: All 16 drug companies that inked deals with the Trump administration over the past few months still raised some of their prices for 2026.

item.title: Measles is spreading fast in S.C. Here's what it says about vaccine exemptions
item.description: More than 550 people have contracted measles in Spartanburg County, S.C., in a fast-growing outbreak. Like a majority of U.S. counties, nonmedical exe...

item.title: For those with addiction, going into and coming out of prison can be a minefield.
item.description: Many jails and prisons around the country don't provide medication treatment for opioid use disorder. Studies show that medication makes recovery more...

item.title: It took 75 governors to elect a woman. Spanberger will soon be at Virginia's helm
item.description: Abigail Spanberger, a former CIA officer and three-term congresswoman, is breaking long-held traditions on inauguration day. She says she wants her sw...

item.title: December board game update
item.description: This is a short update on the Planet Money Board Game project.

item.title: A Liberian man has now been released twice after his dramatic battering-ram arrest in Minneapolis
item.description: A Liberian man has been shuttled in and out of custody since immigration agents in Minnesota broke down his door with a battering ram.

item.title: Trump pardoning Puerto Rico's former governor Wanda Vázquez, sources say
item.description: Puerto Rico's former governor Wanda Vázquez was previously indicted in a federal corruption case.

item.title: Man accused of murdering woman and toddler in Munich car attack goes on trial
item.description: The Afghan suspect is accused of killing a 37-year-old woman and her two-year-old daughter.

item.title: OpenAI to start testing ads on ChatGPT in the coming weeks
item.description: The ads will appear at the bottom of the chat window on the free and low-subscription versions of ChatGPT, OpenAI said Friday in a blog post.

item.title: 5 fun facts about "Saturday Morning" hosts Adriana Diaz and Kelly O'Grady
item.description: Get to know Adriana Diaz and Kelly O'Grady after they took their seats behind the "CBS Saturday Morning" anchor desk for the first time.

item.title: Trump threatens new tariffs on countries opposed to Greenland takeover
item.description: The president made the threat while a bipartisan group of US lawmakers were visiting Denmark in the hope of easing tensions over the territory.

item.title: New details released on fatal Minneapolis shooting of Renee Good by ICE officer
item.description: New details have been released on the Jan. 7 fatal shooting of 37-year-old Renee Good in south Minneapolis by ICE officer Jonathan Ross. The reports s...

item.title: Uganda's president heads for victory as his main rival cries foul
item.description: President Museveni has about 75% of the vote with results in from more than half of all polling stations.

item.title: California federal judge rejects effort by DOJ to gather sensitive voter roll data
item.description: U.S. District Judge David Carter ruled the Justice Dept.'s demand for voter roll data would trample on Californians' privacy rights

item.title: Exiled crown prince urges world to help protesters topple Iran's government
item.description: Reza Pahlavi, a US-based opposition figure, called on the world to target Iran's Revolutionary Guards leadership.

item.title: Machado vows to lead Venezuela 'when right time comes'
item.description: The opposition leader says she has a mandate to lead the country after the US seized its president.

item.title: Federal immigration agents filmed dragging a woman from her car in Minneapolis
How the Insurrection Act has been used and what Trump wants to do with it
